content.rendered:
learn

Accreditation of Prior Learning

Gain a diploma without attending courses

Gain recognition for your humanitarian skills and move your career along more quickly by obtaining a diploma awarded by Bioforce!

Accreditation of Prior Learning (APL) at Bioforce

Accreditation of Prior Learning (APL) is an opportunity for people to gain recognition for their experience (professional or otherwise) in order to obtain a diploma. It is therefore obtained through experience (rather than by means of formal education or lifelong learning) and based on aspects other than a final examination. Please note that APL at Bioforce is not available in English.

Admission criteria

  • At least one year in post, whether in a single period or broken up, directly related to the target qualification. All paid and unpaid work is taken into consideration for APL applications (volunteering, internships, placements, etc.) whether in France or abroad.
  • A Level 1 Civic safety and prevention certificate (first aid certificate or equivalent). The APL process can be started in advance of the course, but it must be completed in advance of the viva before the panel.

Personal stories

Thanks to this diploma, I now feel fully legitimate in project management, all my knowledge is recognised. I could perhaps evolve and go from project coordinator to head of mission.Currently I am acting as interim head of mission, I hope that this diploma will allow me to access this kind of job more quickly in my NGO.

Ali Abdelrahman
Project coordinator in CAR

Triangle Génération Humanitaire
